It amazes me how all of those cunty influencers, even those who live in squalor like that, somehow own martini glasses, without fail. And when her friends go to make drinks, there are always martini glasses. And every time she bitches about how her last boyfriend never cooked for her, you can see the pile of crusty dishes in the sink stacked up but she never washes them. And you watch this shitshow from your nice clean place after taking a shower and eating from clean plates
